title: Development of Metacognitive Strategies in Hypermedia Learning Environments: Simulation-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific knowledge and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: A customized VR-based science learning environment for working professionals, systematically training metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science concepts with over 85% accuracy by utilizing metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation) in a hypermedia environment.
Learners can improve learning efficiency by over 30% by applying self-regulated learning strategies during VR simulation tasks.
Learners can manage cognitive load arising during information-seeking processes in digital environments using a 5-step checklist.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
